text: 14-15 mada pitudeka pura liyawunu waidya waruna gunathilaka liyu rupawahini wadasatahan gana liyu wiwechanathmaka lipiyak.

ema wisanduma idiripath kala yuththe wiplawawadi samajawadi wyaparaya wisini.

wisiekwana siyawasata galapena ayurin paramparika sampradayika kalawan gaweshanathmakawa ha wishleshanathmakawa nirmanaya kirimata awashya widyathmaka pasubima, thorathuru thakshanaya, ingrisi ha bhasha danuma, kalamanakaranaya ha wruththiya margopadeshanaya laba dima.
banku ginuma -
anika me kattiya genihin danna thawath aatha yanna wenawa.
siyalu wagakim uu bhara gannawa kiyana poronduwa matha ha uge duka iwasanna barima thana api lokanthaya bala pitath unemu.

wamathkaruwange sangamaya daksha wamathkaru lamayinta shishyathwa laba denawa.

salli hambawenawa nam ee wenuwen thamange demawpiyo unath yodaganna mewun pasubata wenne na.
namuth unwahanse dewiyanta apahasa kala kiyala kuruse ana gahala maruwa.
pradhana nalu charithayakin thorawa chithrapatayak boks ofis aadayam wartha thabiya haki janapriyathwayak kara ragena ya haki indiya niliyan sitinne athalossaki.
onna ape hela yakek sel lipiyakawath liya thibuna nam wishwasa kala hakiyi.
porage siyage indan rata kawanan thamayi aathal eka wadi.
kese ho himidiri pandara wana wita api bandarawelata sendu wi sitiyemu.

me anuwa niyamitha oowara 50 thula di kadulu 6k dawi lakunu 325k ras karanu labini.shehan jayasuriya 71, ramitha rambaukwalla 66, dhananjaya da silwa 79k bhanuka rajapaksha 42k lesa lakunu ras kalaha.pandu yawime di jak parsan lakunu 58kata kadulu 1k da, adambal lakunu 59kata 1 kadullak da lewis gregari lakunu 71kata kadullak da gurman randew lakunu 34kata kadullak da bagin dawa gathha.

ee oya kiyapu detayi mama kiwwe.
lankawe kalayak janapriya wela thibuna godak westarn karapu band wala uu lid gitar eka ple kala.
samawenna pariwarthanaya karanna welawak naha.
namuth, ethan sita pawathina dirgha kalayak pura, pamanak, mama naraka aaranchiyak dara, ee nisa katha kirimata, paliha ha bindunu yowun wiye hadawath thula paudgalika sangamaya.
oyala hithuwada mekath mattu wena sin ekak kiyala.

dawalta wage nam frayid rayis saha rayis and kari kamata ganna puluwan.godak welawata maluwa warga hayak withara thiyanawa.obata kamathi widiyata 4k thoragena kanna ganna puluwan.athi wenna kanna ganna puluwan ekath wasiyak.frayid rayis ekak 270k wage wenawa.rathri kalayatath kama ganna puluwan.me kama walata yam thak durakata ajinamoto nam ekathu karana gathiyak penna thiyanawa.rasa awulak na.rayis and kari kanawa nam menu eka dawasen dawasata wenas wenawa.dawasin dawasata wishesha kama wargath ganna puluwan.ee de issaraha thiyana bod eke darshanaya karalayi thiyenne

adhishitha kala haki widuru pamanak bhawitha kala yuthu athara nathinam eetama sudusu lesa nishpaditha plastik bhajana ho bag yodaganna.

panthi kamara darshanawaladi rangapamata pasale apa panthiyema siti rathnasiri rajapaksha (hitapu nagaradhipathi), jayantha kalupahana (madhyawedi), nimal hettiaarachchi (aacharya), shri lal jayamaha thora gathimu.

eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya wisin uthuru koriyawata erehiwa thawath sambadhaka panawima magin apeksha karanne 'pyongyan' palanaye awi wyapruthiya sandaha erata aanayana apanayana magin laba ganna aadayama hina kirimayi.

mama bahinne waligama.
daruweku labimen yugadiwiya sampurna wana bawa samajaya thula pawathina mathayayi.
owunge duka danna kenek.
pawathina adhyapana ratawa thula nidahas adhyapanayata labiya yuthu nisi thana siyayata siyayak labenawa kiya mama hithanne naha.
ee kale benge duwa nam mage yaluuwek.

palathama suwanda gahanawa.
